T02D1452:358b-1: ao la tsastu sta ya bi bhangga n'a ma /
T02D1452:359a-2: bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1452:359a-3: gang gis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang //
T02D1452:359a-4: bdud bzhi rnam par mnan mdzad pa'i //
T02D1452:359a-5: gang mdzad de la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D1452:359a-6: rim pa bzhi ni gsal bar dgrol //
T02D1452:359a-7: ae wam m'a y'a zhes bya ni //
T02D1452:359a-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1452:359a-10: re zhig thun mong ma yin pa'i theg pa 'di la sdud par mdzad pa ni /
T02D1452:359a-11: byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje yin la /
T02D1452:359a-12: de yang dgongs pa'i skad kyis /
T02D1452:359a-13: ae dang wam ni sdud par mdzad pa'i gsung ma yin gyi /
T02D1452:359a-14: rdo rje 'chang gi bzhugs pa'i bzhugs gnas brdas bstan pa yin no //
T02D1452:359a-15: de yang tshig mdzes pa dang /
T02D1452:359a-18: sdeb sbyor la mos pa rnams dang /
T02D1452:359a-19: lha rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched du
T02D1452:359a-20: brjod par bya ba'i gtso bo thabs dang shes rab
T02D1452:359a-22: yi ge gnyis kyis bstan pa yin la /
T02D1452:359a-23: de nyid tshig la ltos pa med pa dang /
T02D1452:359a-24: spros pa spong ba rnams la /
T02D1452:359a-25: de nas gsang ba bshad par bya //
T02D1452:359a-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yi ge gnyis kyi
T02D1452:359a-27: tshig las gzhan par rgyud de dang de las gsungs
T02D1452:359a-28: pa yin no // de bas na rdo rje 'chang
T02D1452:359a-29: nyid kyis gsung bar bya ba'i skye bo la dgongs
T02D1452:359a-30: nas dgyes pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i rgyud kha
T02D1452:359a-31: cig tu yi ge gnyis kyis bshad de /
T02D1452:359a-32: de yang dngos po rnams chu dang /
T02D1452:359a-34: nam mkha' rnams kyis bsdus pa ni pha las byung ba ste wam ngo //
T02D1452:359a-37: ye shes kyi khams rnams ni ma las byung ba ste ae'o //
T02D1452:359a-38: de bas na ae wam ngo //
T02D1452:359a-39: de bas na sdud par mdzad pa'i gsung ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1452:359a-40: ae ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1452:359a-41: wam ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1452:359a-42: m'a ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D1452:359a-43: y'a ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o zhes bya ba smos so //
T02D1452:359a-44: de la ae ni rno ba yin pa'am /
T02D1452:359a-46: bha ga'i rnam par gnas pa'am /
T02D1452:359a-48: nam mkha' ltar stong par gnas pa'am /
T02D1452:359a-49: gcod cing 'bigs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ram /
T02D1452:359a-50: sred pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1452:359a-53: 'bum phrag lnga'i kye rdo rje las //
T02D1452:359b-0: @359b shes rab ae yi gzugs can ma //
T02D1452:359b-1: blo ldan nam mkha'i khams su bsam //
T02D1452:359b-4: rno phyir me yi gzugs dag tu //
T02D1452:359b-5: de yang ma mo rnams su brtags //
T02D1452:359b-6: dbyangs yig dang po'i rang bzhin du //
T02D1452:359b-7: sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu brtags //
T02D1452:359b-9: las zhes bya ba ni lus dang /
T02D1452:359b-11: yid bde ba'i las byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1452:359b-12: rgya zhes bya ba ni des mtshon par byed pa'i phyir /
T02D1452:359b-15: chos brjod pa'i yi ge dang 'dra ba'am /
T02D1452:359b-16: dkar po'i don brjod pa yin pa'am /
T02D1452:359b-18: nyon mongs pa thams cad 'khru bar byed pa'am /
T02D1452:359b-19: bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pas de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1452:359b-20: m'a ni kun du khyab cing rgya che ba'am /
T02D1452:359b-24: rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bde ba yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1452:359b-26: y'a ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'am /
T02D1452:359b-27: ji ltar gnas pa de ltar gnas pa'am /
T02D1452:359b-28: ji bzhin pa'i mtshan nyid ston pa'am /
T02D1452:359b-29: ji ltar byon pa de ltar gshegs pa'am /
T02D1452:359b-30: dam bcas pa ltar gnas pa de'i phyir /
T02D1452:359b-32: gzhan yang yi ge bzhi ni 'byung ba bzhi'i mtshan nyid can /
T02D1452:359b-33: lha mo spyan ma la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02D1452:359b-37: sku bzhi la sogs pa yang yin no //
T02D1452:359b-38: gzhan yang yi ge bzhi ni phyag rgya bzhi'i don ston pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1452:359b-39: de ltar phyag rgya bzhir bstan pa de nyid stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1452:359b-40: snying rje las gzhan pa yod pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
T02D1452:359b-42: wam ni thabs so zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1452:359b-43: dngos po med pa ston pa ni shes rab yin la /
T02D1452:359b-44: dngos po'i mtshan nyid ston pa ni thabs yin te /
T02D1452:359b-45: gong bu gsum gsum ste drug gi bdag nyid do //
T02D1452:359b-46: de bas de'i phyir dngos po thams cad ni yi ge gnyis so //
T02D1452:359b-50: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'o zhes bya ba ni
T02D1452:359b-51: lus can rnams la rtsa'i 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis rang
T02D1452:359b-52: bzhin du gnas zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1452:359b-53: de rnams kyi 'dab ma'i grangs rim bzhin du /
T02D1452:360a-2: sum cu rtsa gnyis su rig par bya ste /
T02D1452:360a-6: chu tshod kyi dbye bas rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1452:360a-7: de rnams kyi kha dog ni ser po dang /
T02D1452:360a-11: las bzhi'i bye brag gis dbye bar bya'o //
T02D1452:360a-12: a'a li k'a li ni g-yon pa dang /
T02D1452:360a-14: g-yon pa ni aa la sogs pa bcu drug gi dbyangs su 'ong la /
T02D1452:360a-16: g-yas pa ni ka la sogs pa lnga tshan gyi rang bzhin du 'gro ste /
T02D1452:360a-17: skyon gyi ngo bo zhes bya'o //
T02D1452:360a-18: de bas na de gnyis ni yon tan skyon gyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba yang yin no //
T02D1452:360a-23: a'a a'i a'u aee aoo aam /
T02D1452:360a-24: zhes pa ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1452:360a-25: aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha zhes pa ni /
T02D1452:360a-26: sprul pa'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'i yi ge rnams so //
T02D1452:360a-29: chos kyi 'khor lo zhes pa ni /
T02D1452:360a-30: chos kyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i yi ge rnams so //
T02D1452:360a-31: de'i dbus su ni yi ge h'um ste /
T02D1452:360a-32: bde bar gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1452:360a-33: de ltar yang gong du bstan pa'i sde tshan rnams
T02D1452:360a-34: kyi rang bzhin ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya
T02D1452:360a-35: ste / de'i lte ba la ni rnal 'byor ma
T02D1452:360a-36: thams cad kyi rang bzhin yi ge aam gnas pa'o
T02D1452:360a-37: ste / // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo zhes pa ni /
T02D1452:360a-38: mgrin pa'i 'dab ma bcu drug go //
T02D1452:360a-39: de la gnas pa'i yi ge ni aom a'a a'i a'a aee zhes bya ba rnams so //
T02D1452:360a-40: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:360a-41: gong du brjod pa'i chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1452:360a-42: de'i lte ba la ni yi ge ham zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1452:360a-43: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sdom pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1452:360a-44: 'og tu yi ge ksha zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1452:360a-46: lus thams cad la 'gro ba dang /
T02D1452:360a-47: 'ong ba'i sgo gnyis su gnas pa las /
T02D1452:360a-48: 'og gi sgo srungs ni ni ksha ste 'og sgor ro //
T02D1452:360a-49: de nyid ni 'jig rten phan pa rnams la phung po zad par byed pa yang yin no //
T02D1452:360a-50: zla ba dang nyi ma dag ni 'og dang steng gi sgo gnyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:360a-51: sgo gnyis kyi ming bstan pa yon tan dang skyon gyi rang bzhin can no //
T02D1452:360a-52: de yang steng gi ni gdung ba bskyed pa'i sgo yin la /
T02D1452:360b-0: 'og gi @360b ni lus ngag yid sems par byed pa'i sgo zhes bya'o //
T02D1452:360b-1: gnad 'byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:360b-2: steng gi dga' ba'i dbang phyug ste steng na'o //
T02D1452:360b-3: de gnyis nyid ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba ste /
T02D1452:360b-4: yar la sreg pa'i tshul du 'gro la /
T02D1452:360b-5: mar ni gso ba'i tshul du 'ong bas na /
T02D1452:360b-7: rnal 'byor bzhi zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:360b-8: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba gnyis ka la'o //
T02D1452:360b-9: myur ba dang zhes bya ba ni me'o //
T02D1452:360b-10: rlangs pa dang zhes bya ba ni rlung ngo //
T02D1452:360b-11: rnam par 'ching ba dang zhes bya ba ni sa'o //
T02D1452:360b-12: dal ba dang zhes bya ba ni chu ste /
T02D1452:360b-13: de ltar na 'gro 'ong gnyis ni rnal 'byor bzhi'o //
T02D1452:360b-14: steng gi logs nas 'dzag pa ni 'og tu'o zhes
T02D1452:360b-15: bya ba ni de ltar 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor gyi
T02D1452:360b-16: stobs kyis / steng tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas 'dzag
T02D1452:360b-17: pa ni mi la sogs pa'i 'og gi yul du'o
T02D1452:360b-18: stobs kyis / // ting nge 'dzin gsum ste 'gro ba dang 'ong ba de nyid la'o //
T02D1452:360b-19: dang po'i rnal 'byor dang zhes pa ni stong pa nyid dam /
T02D1452:360b-20: yang na tsand'a l'i gyen du bskyod pa'o //
T02D1452:360b-21: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog dang zhes pa ni /
T02D1452:360b-22: phyag mtshan la sogs pa gyur pa las gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa'am /
T02D1452:360b-23: yang na tsand'a l'i 'og tu spyan drangs pa'o //
T02D1452:360b-24: las kyi rgyal po mchog go zhes pa ni sku phra mo'i spro ba'am /
T02D1452:360b-25: yang na bde ba'i stobs kyis gzung ba'o //
T02D1452:360b-26: de nyid gsal par bstan pa /
T02D1452:360b-27: dgug pa dang zhes smos te gtum mos so //
T02D1452:360b-28: gshegs su gsol ba dang zhes pa ni gtum mo ste steng du'o //
T02D1452:360b-31: yan lag bzhi'i ni zhes pa ni /
T02D1452:360b-32: sgrub par byed pa'i rnal 'byor rnams la'o //
T02D1452:360b-35: sgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen po zhes pa ni /
T02D1452:360b-36: rim pa gnyis la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas go rims bzhin du bsnyen pa stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1452:360b-37: nye bar sgrub pa sa bon dgod pa dang /
T02D1452:360b-38: sgrub pa sku yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1452:360b-39: sgrub pa chen pos yan lag gsal ba'am /
T02D1452:360b-40: yang na sku phra mo spros pas 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
T02D1452:360b-42: bsnyen pa la khro bo gtsug tor zhes bya ba'i rigs su bsgom pa dang /
T02D1452:360b-43: nye bar sgrub pa'i dus su khro bo bdud rtsi
T02D1452:360b-44: 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i gzugs su bsgom pa dang
T02D1452:361a-0: / sgrub pa la ni lha'i gzugs zhes bya bar bsgom @361a * //
T02D1452:361a-2: sgrub pa chen po la sangs rgyas kyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i ming can bsgom pa'o //
T02D1452:361a-3: de yang khro bo gtsug tor zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:361a-4: rnam par shes pa dang nam mkha'i rigs mi bskyod pa yin te /
T02D1452:361a-5: bla ma'i zhal las rtogs par bya ba yin la /
T02D1452:361a-6: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i khro bo ni rlung don yod
T02D1452:361a-7: grub pa'i rigs snying ga na gnas pa yin no
T02D1452:361a-8: // lha'i gzugs ni gtum mo spro ba ste /
T02D1452:361a-10: sangs rgyas bdag po ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02D1452:361a-12: 'bras bu bzhi ni zhes pa ni /
T02D1452:361a-15: rgyu mthun pa dang zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D1452:361a-16: h'um du bskyed pa la sogs pa'i yin no //
T02D1452:361a-17: rnam par smin pa dang zhes pa ni /
T02D1452:361a-18: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin yin no //
T02D1452:361a-19: skyes bu byed pa dang zhes pa ni /
T02D1452:361a-20: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa lnga'i tshul du'o //
T02D1452:361a-21: bral ba'o zhes bya ba ni de'i stobs kyis gzung bar rtog pa dang /
T02D1452:361a-22: 'dzin par rtog pa'i dri ma gnyis spong zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1452:361a-23: dbye ba bzhi zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:361a-24: skyes bu grub pa po'i khyad par bstan pa yin no //
T02D1452:361a-25: rtul po dang zhes bya ba ni dbang po rtul po ste tha ma'o //
T02D1452:361a-27: dbang po 'bring po ste bar ma'o //
T02D1452:361a-28: rnon po zhes bya ba ni skyes bu dbang po rnon po'i yang rnon po ste /
T02D1452:361a-29: dbang po rab tu gtugs pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1452:361a-30: skad cig ces bya ba ni dus kyi khyad par ro //
T02D1452:361a-31: rnam pa sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni dga' ba'o //
T02D1452:361a-32: rnam par smin pa zhes bya ba ni mchog dga'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1452:361a-33: rnam par nyid pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:361a-34: khyad par gyi dga' ba'i skad cig ma'o //
T02D1452:361a-35: mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i skad cig go //
T02D1452:361a-40: dga' ba bzhi ni dga' ba dang /
T02D1452:361a-42: khyad par gyi dga' ba dang /
T02D1452:361a-43: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02D1452:361a-44: bzang po bzhi ni zhes pa ni /
T02D1452:361a-45: bdag gi bzang po dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1452:361a-47: yang na phung po la sogs pa gzod ma nas lha'i rang bzhin yin pa'am /
T02D1452:361b-0: gzod @361b ma nas skye ba med pa ni bzang po zhes bya'o //
T02D1452:361b-1: dus kyi bzang po zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:361b-3: bsam du med pa'i dus la sogs pa'o //
T02D1452:361b-4: ye shes kyi bzang po zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:361b-5: de'i stobs kyis 'dzag pa med pas phung po la sogs pa rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1452:361b-6: rlung gi bzang po zhes bya ba ni 'gags pas bzang po yin pa'am /
T02D1452:361b-7: rgyu ba med pas bzang po yin pa'am /
T02D1452:361b-8: yang na rlung bzhi las re re 'grub pa'am /
T02D1452:361b-9: yang na me'i ri mo can na gnas pa yin pa'am /
T02D1452:361b-10: yang na g-yon pa dang g-yas pa dag las so //
T02D1452:361b-11: g-yon pa'i rgyu ba ni rlung gi bzang po zhes bya'o //
T02D1452:361b-12: gnas bzhi ni zhes bya ba ni rten par bya ba'am /
T02D1452:361b-13: gzhi yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1452:361b-14: gzhan gyi gnas dang zhes bya ba ni gzhan rten la ltos pa'i phyir te /
T02D1452:361b-18: bdag gi gnas dang zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor
T02D1452:361b-19: pa bdag nyid bde ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro
T02D1452:361b-20: // rnal 'byor gyi gnas zhes bya ba ni snyoms par zhugs pa las /
T02D1452:361b-21: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rten gyi bde ba byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1452:361b-22: de kho na nyid kyi gnas dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:361b-23: de ltar snyoms par zhugs pa las /
T02D1452:361b-25: nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1452:361b-26: de kho na gsum zhes bya bya ba ni /
T02D1452:361b-27: phyin ci ma log pas de kho na nyid do //
T02D1452:361b-28: de ni bdag gi de kho na nyid dang zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1452:361b-29: bdag med pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1452:361b-30: lha'i de kho na zhes bya ba ni phung po
T02D1452:361b-31: la sogs pa gzod ma nas phyin ci ma log
T02D1452:361b-32: pa'i lha yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1452:361b-33: dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na zhes bya ba ni
T02D1452:361b-34: gzod ma nas phung po rnams phyin ci ma log
T02D1452:361b-35: pa'i lha'i gzhal yas khang yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1452:361b-36: dkyil 'khor gsum ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:361b-39: snying po thim pa yin pas dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1452:361b-40: sku'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:361b-42: lha'i gnas yin pa'i don to //
T02D1452:361b-43: gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:361b-44: de'i nang dus bon las lhar bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1452:361b-45: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba ni sems nyid thams cad kyi gzhi yin la /
T02D1452:362a-0: de kho na nyid kyi gnas @362a * //
T02D1452:362a-3: chos rnams rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'o //
T02D1452:362a-4: dmigs pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1452:362a-5: dmigs pa med pa'o zhes bya ba ni ming gnyis so //
T02D1452:362a-6: dmigs pa med pa ni rdo rje 'dzin gyi dbugs
T02D1452:362a-7: 'byin pa'o zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa
T02D1452:362a-8: la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rdo rje ste
T02D1452:362a-9: / rtogs pa'i go skabs med cing /
T02D1452:362a-11: sprul pa'i dmigs pa ni zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'i sprul pas so //
T02D1452:362a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs 'byin pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:362a-13: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T02D1452:362a-14: rags pa'i rtog pa las dbugs phyung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1452:362a-16: ji srid du dmigs pa med pa la gnas pa de srid du 'khor ba'o //
T02D1452:362a-17: sku gsum ni zhes bya ba ni rgyud las gsungs pa'o //
T02D1452:362a-18: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:362a-19: sku gsum ni thig le gsum mam /
T02D1452:362a-20: yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid 'byung ba'am /
T02D1452:362a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga ni zhes bya ba ni rgyud las gsungs pa'i rgyal ba rigs lnga'o //
T02D1452:362a-24: gzugs dang zhes bya ba ni rnam pa snang mdzad do //
T02D1452:362a-25: tshor ba dang zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1452:362a-26: 'du shes dang zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D1452:362a-27: 'du byed dang zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba don yod grub pa'o //
T02D1452:362a-28: rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1452:362a-29: ye shes lnga ni me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /
T02D1452:362a-30: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
T02D1452:362a-31: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
T02D1452:362a-32: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes dang /
T02D1452:362a-33: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes so
T02D1452:362a-34: zhes bya ba ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa
T02D1452:362a-35: la sogs pa yongs su gyur pa'o //
T02D1452:362a-36: lha mo bzhi ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:362a-37: na bza' dkar mo la sogs pa'o //
T02D1452:362a-41: rlung dang zhes bya ba ni lha mo spyan ma la sogs pa go rims bzhin te /
T02D1452:362a-46: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mig la sogs pa'i
T02D1452:362a-47: dbang po rnams so zhes bya ba ni gti mug
T02D1452:362b-1: ser sna la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1452:362b-2: sa bcu zhes bya ba ni rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1452:362b-3: de nas 'di ltar 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1452:362b-4: gnas ni pull'i ra ma la ya dang /
T02D1452:362b-8: bzhi po ni gnas yin no //
T02D1452:362b-9: nye ba'i gnas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:362b-14: bzhi po ni nye ba'i gnas te brgyad yin la /
T02D1452:362b-15: de yang thugs kyi 'khor lo ste mkha' la spyod pa yin no //
T02D1452:362b-16: zhing dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:362b-19: nye ba'i zhing dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:362b-22: tshando ha zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:362b-25: nye ba'i tshando ha zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:362b-28: 'di ni gsung gi 'khor lo ste sa la spyod pa'o //
T02D1452:362b-29: 'du ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:362b-30: yi dags lhag par gnas pa dang /
T02D1452:362b-32: nye ba'i 'du ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:362b-35: dur khrod dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:362b-37: nye ba'i dur khrod dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:362b-40: nyi shu rtsa bzhir dbye bas dbye bar bya'o zhes
T02D1452:362b-41: bya ba ni de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas nyi
T02D1452:362b-42: shu rtsa bzhir dbye bar bya'o //
T02D1452:362b-43: pu ll'i ra ma la ya zhes bya ba nas /
T02D1452:362b-44: ku lu ta zhes bya ba yan chad ni go sla'o //
T02D1452:362b-45: 'di rnams rim pa ji lta bas //
T02D1452:362b-46: zhes bya ba ni gong du brjod pa de rnams so //
T02D1452:362b-47: spyi bo dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:362b-48: pu ll'i rar ni rab tu gtum ma'o //
T02D1452:362b-49: so dang sen mo rab tu skyed //
T02D1452:362b-51: spyi gtsug dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:362b-52: dz'a landha rar gtum mig ma //
T02D1452:362b-53: skra dang spu ni rab tu skyed //
T02D1452:362b-55: rna ba g-yas pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:362b-56: ao da ya na zhes bya ba'i gnas ming ni /
T02D1452:362b-57: lha mo 'od ldan ma zhes bya ba pags pa dang dri ma skyed pa'o zhes bya'o //
T02D1452:362b-58: rtsib logs dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:362b-59: aarbu da na shangs chen ma /
T02D1452:362b-60: sha ni rab tu skyed mdzad ma'o //
T02D1452:362b-62: rna ba g-yon pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:362b-63: go d'a ba rir dpa' blo ma //
T02D1452:362b-64: rgyus pa rab tu skyed par byed //
T02D1452:362b-66: smin ma'i dbus dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:362b-67: r'a me shva rar mi'u thung ma /
T02D1452:362b-68: rus pa rab tu skyed par byed //
T02D1452:363a-1: dag dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:363a-2: langka'i bdag mo lha mo'i rdzong /
T02D1452:363a-3: des ni mchin pa rab tu skyed //
T02D1452:363a-5: lag pa'i rtsab dag dang ni //
T02D1452:363a-7: m'a la bar ni ljon grib ma //
T02D1452:363a-8: snying sprug rab tu skyed par mdzad //
T02D1452:363a-10: mchan khung dag dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:363a-11: k'a ma r'ur gnas sa srung ma //
T02D1452:363a-12: mig ni rab tu skyed par byed //
T02D1452:363a-14: nu ma gnyis dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:363a-15: ao trer 'jigs byed chen mo gnas //
T02D1452:363a-16: mkhris pa rab tu skyed par byed //
T02D1452:363a-18: lte ba dang zhes pa ni /
T02D1452:363a-19: tri sha ku ner rlung shugs ma //
T02D1452:363a-20: glo ba rab tu skyed par byed //
T02D1452:363a-22: sna'i rtse mo dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:363a-23: ko sa lar ni skyems gsol ma //
T02D1452:363a-24: rgyu ma rab tu skyed par byed //
T02D1452:363a-26: kha dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:363a-27: ka linggar ni sngo bsangs mo //
T02D1452:363a-28: rtsib logs skud pa'i rten byed ma'o //
T02D1452:363a-30: phrag gong zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:363a-31: shin tu bzang po lamba kar //
T02D1452:363a-32: lto ba'i gnas ni rab tu skyed //
T02D1452:363a-34: snying dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:363a-35: k'anytsi la gnas rta rna ma //
T02D1452:363a-36: ltag par dri chen skyed par byed //
T02D1452:363a-38: pho mtshan dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:363a-39: gsang gnas la gnas bya gdong ma //
T02D1452:363a-40: mtshogs [*ma tshogs?] ma'i srubs ni skyed par byed //
T02D1452:363a-42: rtags dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:363a-43: pre ta pu rir rab gnas pa //
T02D1452:363a-44: 'khor lo'i shugs can mchil ma skyed //
T02D1452:363a-46: bshang ba'i lam dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:363a-47: khyim gyi lha gnas dum skyes ma //
T02D1452:363a-48: rnag ni rtag par skyed par byed //
T02D1452:363a-50: brang gi gnas dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:363a-52: rtag tu rnag ni rab tu skyed //
T02D1452:363a-54: byin pa dag dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:363a-55: 'khor los sgyur ma gser gling gnas //
T02D1452:363a-56: rdul ni rtag tu skyed par byed //
T02D1452:363a-58: sor mo rnams dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:363a-59: shin tu dbang mo grong khyer gnas //
T02D1452:363a-60: tshil ni rtag tu skyed par byed //
T02D1452:363a-62: rkang pa'i rgyab dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:363a-63: sindhur stobs che na ma zhes gnas //
T02D1452:363a-64: mya ngan bcas shing mchi ma skyed //
T02D1452:363a-66: mthe bong dag dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:363a-67: ma ror 'khor los sgyur ba gnas //
T02D1452:363a-68: ltag par lud ba skam po skyed //
T02D1452:363a-70: pus mo gnyis dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:363a-71: ku lu tar gnas brtson chen ma //
T02D1452:363b-0: sna chu @363b rtag tu skyed par byed //
T02D1452:363b-2: blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1452:363b-3: pull'i ra ma la yar ni mgo zug go ces
T02D1452:363b-4: bya ba ni yan lag thams cad la thim mo
T02D1452:363b-5: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
T02D1452:363b-6: gong du bshad pa'i gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi por
T02D1452:363b-7: byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba'i lus kyi khams
T02D1452:363b-8: sku gsum gyi tshul gyis mgo zug pa dang /
T02D1452:363b-9: longs spyod pa dang thim pa ni gnas nyi shu
T02D1452:363b-10: rtsa bzhi po re re la yang gsum gsum du
T02D1452:363b-11: blta'o // gnas 'di rnams su zhes bya ba ni brjod ma thag pa'o //
T02D1452:363b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1452:363b-13: ji ltar ba de bas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:363b-14: ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba'i bye brag gis so //
T02D1452:363b-15: bde ba chen po'i ye shes zhes bya ba ni
T02D1452:363b-16: 'dzag pa med pa'i bde bas ye shes bskyed pa'i
T02D1452:363b-17: phyir ro // rim pa ji lta bar chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1452:363b-18: sprul pa'i gzugs kyis zhes bya ba ni gnas nyi
T02D1452:363b-19: shu rtsa bzhi po rim pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D1452:363b-20: du sku gsum gyi tshul gyis thig le 'byung zhing
T02D1452:363b-21: / nyams su myong zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1452:363b-24: rab tu thim pa'o zhes bya ba ni gong du brjod pa'i tshul gyis te /
T02D1452:363b-25: dper na nyi ma shar ba dang /
T02D1452:363b-27: nub pa bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1452:363b-28: ji ltar 'di rnams kyi gtso bos zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:363b-29: de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas mgo zug pa dang /
T02D1452:363b-31: thim pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo ni rlung yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1452:363b-32: ao di ya na zhes bya ba ni rna ba g-yas pa ste 'byung ba'i lam mo //
T02D1452:363b-33: gnad kyi sgo phyed pa zhes bya ba ni smin mtshams su'o //
T02D1452:363b-34: rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas bskul zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:363b-35: ye shes kyi mes bde ba bskul ba'o //
T02D1452:363b-36: dz'a landha rar bde ba chen po'i ye shes 'du ba'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:363b-37: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i bde bar gshegs pa rnams
T02D1452:363b-38: kyi dbu'i gtsug tor nas zhugs pa'i dam tshig gi
T02D1452:363b-39: 'khor lo'i ming can du bde ba'i ye shes sdud
T02D1452:363b-41: phyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sdud par
T02D1452:363b-42: bya'o zhes bya ba ni ye shes rim pa nas
T02D1452:364a-7: rdul tshon 'bri ba la sogs pa'i bsod nams 'di'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:364a-8: rnal 'byor pa bdag la phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdud rtsi len cing /
T02D1452:364a-9: bdag gi lus ngag yid sim par byed pas na
T02D1452:364a-10: sbyin sreg dang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa 'di nyid
T02D1452:364a-11: mchog ste / phyi'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pas lus ngal bar byed pas ci zhig bya ste /
T02D1452:364a-12: spang bar bya zhes bya ba yin la /
T02D1452:364a-13: de las gzhan pa gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa
T02D1452:364a-14: spyod pa'i las dang por gtogs pa rnams kyis spang
T02D1452:364a-16: 'bad pas spyad par bya ba'i don to //
T02D1452:364a-17: rgyud kyi rim pa'o zhes bya ba ni rim pa ston par byed pa las /
T02D1452:364a-18: 'di ni rim pa dang po lus can rnams la rang bzhin du bstan to //
T02D1452:364a-19: dpal rim pa bzhi pa'i 'grel pa las //
T02D1452:364a-20: rgyud kyi rim pa'i 'grel pa bstan pa ste dang po rdzogs so /
T02D1452:364a-22: // / bsrub pa dang srub par byed pa'i sbyor ba
T02D1452:364a-23: las zhes bya ba ni rtsa gnyis phrad par byed
T02D1452:364a-24: pa'i sbyor ba'am / rtsa gsum la dkrugs pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D1452:364a-25: ye shes kyi me 'di la zhes bya ba ni
T02D1452:364a-26: lte ba na gnas pa'i rang 'byung gi me 'di
T02D1452:364a-27: la'o // las kyi rlung gis bskyod pa zhes bya ba ni g-yas dang g-yon pa'i stobs sam /
T02D1452:364a-29: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du du ba dang 'bar ba dang gsal ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:364a-30: de'i dbang gis dang por du ba ste rlangs pa dang /
T02D1452:364a-32: de las kun du gsal ba'am /
T02D1452:364a-33: yang na de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas
T02D1452:364a-34: na du ba lta bu la sogs pa'i rtags 'byung
T02D1452:364a-35: bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1452:364a-36: dam tshig gi 'khor lor song ste zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:364a-37: bdag gi chos kyi 'khor lor song ba'o //
T02D1452:364a-38: bde bar gshegs pa bsregs zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:364a-39: de na gnas pa'i yi ge thams cad kyi rang bzhin bsregs pa'o //
T02D1452:364a-40: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lor song zhing /
T02D1452:364a-41: thams cad la bskor ba gsum byas pa dang zhes
T02D1452:364b-0: bya ba ni ye shes kyi me de dam @364b
T02D1452:364b-1: tshig gi 'khor lo nas longs spyod kyi 'khor lor
T02D1452:364b-2: song ste / thabs de la gnas pa'i ye shes
T02D1452:364b-3: la bskor ba gsum byed zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1452:364b-4: song ste / // mdzod spur song ste gnad kyi
T02D1452:364b-5: sgo phye ba dang zhes bya ba ni dga' ba'i
T02D1452:364b-6: dbang phyug gi ming can de /
T02D1452:364b-7: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor ston pa'o //
T02D1452:364b-8: ao di ya na zhes bya ba nas phyung zhing
T02D1452:364b-9: zhes bya ba ni bdag gi rna ba g-yas pa
T02D1452:364b-10: nas ye shes kyi me phyung ba'o //
T02D1452:364b-11: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs ka dang /
T02D1452:364b-12: spyi gtsug gi khung bur song ste zhes bya ba
T02D1452:364b-13: ni yang ye shes kyi me de bdag gi ao
T02D1452:364b-14: di ya na nas phyung nas de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1452:364b-15: rnams kyi dza landha ra'i lam nas 'jug cing /
T02D1452:364b-16: dam tshig gi 'khor lor gshegs pa'o //
T02D1452:364b-17: gser gyi sgo nas zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gser gling nas byung ba'o //
T02D1452:364b-18: 'bar ba 'dzin pa zhes bya bar bzhugs so zhes
T02D1452:364b-19: bya ba ni slar bdag gi spyi bo nas zhugs
T02D1452:364b-20: pa'o // sngon bzhin du 'khor lo thams cad ma
T02D1452:364b-21: lus par bsregs te zhes bya ba ni 'ongs nas
T02D1452:364b-23: 'gro ba dang 'jug pa yang mi mthong zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:364b-24: yar me'i la ma nas yang 'gro ba dang /
T02D1452:364b-25: mar chu'i lam nas 'ong ba mi mthong ba'o //
T02D1452:364b-26: ci'i phyir zhe na skra'i nyag ma gcig brgya stong
T02D1452:364b-27: du gshags pa'i tshad kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba
T02D1452:364b-28: ni shin tu phra ba'i tshul gyis 'gro ba dang
T02D1452:364b-30: yang na shin tu phra ba'i tshul du yid gtad par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1452:364b-31: sngags kyi rim pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:364b-32: de ltar rgyud la gnas ba ste /
T02D1452:364b-33: 'khor lo bzhi gnas pa'i yi ge rnams a'a li k'a li las gzhan ma yin pa'am /
T02D1452:364b-34: yang na yar 'gro ba ni k'a li'i sgra dang ldan par 'gro la /
T02D1452:364b-35: mar 'ong ba ni a'a li'i sgra dang ldan par 'ong ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1452:364b-36: dpal rim pa bzhi pa'i 'grel pa las /
T02D1452:364b-37: sngags kyi rim pa'i 'grel pa bstan pa ste gnyis pa rdzogs so /
T02D1452:365a-0: // / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs kar song ste zhes @365a * //
T02D1452:365a-1: bya ba ne ye shes kyi me de sngar bzhin ma bsregs pa rnams bsregs shing /
T02D1452:365a-2: sngon gyi lam nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdud rtsi blang bar bya zhing /
T02D1452:365a-4: dam tshig gi 'khor lor dkrugs shing zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:365a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dkrugs pa'o //
T02D1452:365a-6: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi bdud rtsi khyer nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:365a-8: gong gi sgo nas phyung ste zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:365a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gser gling nas so //
T02D1452:365a-11: de nyid sgo nas zhugs so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:365a-12: bdag gi spyi bo'i sgo nas 'jug pa'o //
T02D1452:365a-13: so'i mtshams kyi mtha'i bug pa nas 'ongs te zhes
T02D1452:365a-14: bya ba ni bdag gi rnyil gyi mtshams nas 'ongs
T02D1452:365a-15: pa'o // longs spyod kyi 'khor lor ngal bso ste
T02D1452:365a-16: zhes bya ba ni gnas der gnas shing bde ba
T02D1452:365a-17: pa'o // rgyas pa'o // bsregs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D1452:365a-18: pa rnams kyi dga' ba skyed pa ste zhes bya
T02D1452:365a-19: ba ni sngar gyi yi ge bsregs pa rnams slar
T02D1452:365a-20: gso zhing dgyes pa bskyed pa'o //
T02D1452:365a-21: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du gnas pa yin no zhes
T02D1452:365a-22: bya ba ni sprul pa'i 'khor lor ye shes thams
T02D1452:365a-23: cad rgyas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1452:365a-24: 'di nyid 'da' bar mi bya ba ste /
T02D1452:365a-25: mkha' 'gro ma kun gyi sngom pa zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D1452:365a-29: skra nyag ma gcig brgya stong du gshags pa'i tshad
T02D1452:365a-30: kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rgyud gong du
T02D1452:365a-32: ye shes kyi rim pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:365a-33: de ltar brjod pa'i sbyor bas bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'i
T02D1452:365a-34: bde ba'i phyir mi 'da' ba ni bde ba'i ye
T02D1452:365a-36: dpal rim pa bzhi pa'i 'grel pa las ye shes
T02D1452:365a-37: kyi rim pa bstan pa ste gsum pa rdzogs so
T02D1452:365a-39: / // / da ni rgyud dang sngags dang /
T02D1452:365a-40: ye shes spang ba zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i
T02D1452:365a-41: rim pa'i khyad par te rgyud du rtogs pa dang
T02D1452:365b-0: @365b ye shes su rtogs pa spangs pa'am dgag pa'o //
T02D1452:365b-1: sgo dgag pa 'gro ba dang 'ong ba las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:365b-2: dbang po'i sgo 'gag cing yar 'gro ba dang /
T02D1452:365b-4: phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:365b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i rtog pa dang bral ba'am /
T02D1452:365b-8: yang na mi gtsang pa'i lus spangs nas pags pa dang /
T02D1452:365b-9: sha dang khrag rus pa dor te /
T02D1452:365b-11: yul rnams las grol ba'o zhes bya ba ni yul rnams la zhen pa med pa ste /
T02D1452:365b-12: mi rtog pa'i yul la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1452:365b-13: mun pa smag tu gyur pa la zla ba'i nor bu ltar 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:365b-14: dper na mun pa 'ga' zhig la mar me'am /
T02D1452:365b-15: chu shel 'od dang ldan pa bzhag na gsal bar 'gyur ba ltar /
T02D1452:365b-16: ma rig pa'i mun pa chen pos smag tu 'gyur
T02D1452:365b-17: ba la ye shes kyi zla ba'i 'od kyis bsal
T02D1452:365b-19: rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs
T02D1452:365b-20: pa'i rdul las khrag gi rang bzhin phyir bor ba'o
T02D1452:365b-21: // stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni chos rnams gzod ma nas stong par shes pa'o //
T02D1452:365b-22: mtshan ma med ba zhes bya ba ni chos rnams gzod ma nas mtshan ma med par rtogs pa'o //
T02D1452:365b-23: smon pa med pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:365b-24: smon par bya ba chos gang yang grub pa med par shes pa'o //
T02D1452:365b-25: rang dang gzhan dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:365b-26: bdag tu rtog pa spangs pa dang /
T02D1452:365b-27: gzhan du rtog pa spangs pa'o //
T02D1452:365b-28: rang rig pa'i ye shes spangs pa zhes bya ba ni rig pa'i ye shes dang bral ba'am /
T02D1452:365b-29: yang na phyogs gcig shes pa'i ye shes spangs pa'o //
T02D1452:365b-30: phyag rgya chen po'i thabs ni bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad rig pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1452:365b-31: mchog tu zhi ba zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po yin te /
T02D1452:365b-32: 'jig rten pa'i dper bya ba las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1452:365b-33: 'dod chags dang zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin du gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs 'phral bar gnas pa'o //
T02D1452:366a-0: 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i rdo rje dang @366a * //
T02D1452:366a-2: rnam par 'grel pa zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin
T02D1452:366a-3: du gnas pa la zhu ba'i bdag nyid du gyur
T02D1452:366a-4: te / gsang ba'i rdo rjer zhugs pa dang /
T02D1452:366a-5: 'dod chags dang bral ba ste nor bu las phyir mi 'byung ba dang bral ba ste /
T02D1452:366a-6: 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
T02D1452:366a-7: mar la mar blugs pa ltar mya ngan las 'das
T02D1452:366a-8: pa byang chub kyi sems bdag med pa'o zhes bya
T02D1452:366a-9: ba ni / dper na mar me 'chi ka ma
T02D1452:366a-10: la mar slar bsnan pa na gsal bar 'gyur ba
T02D1452:366a-11: ba ni / ltar / de ltar brjod pa'i ting
T02D1452:366a-12: nge 'dzin la yang nas yang du gnas pas bde
T02D1452:366a-13: ba chen po'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i phyir zhing
T02D1452:366a-14: ba ni / ltar / gsal te / don dam
T02D1452:366a-15: pa'i byang chub kyi sems bdag med pa rtogs par
T02D1452:366a-16: 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1452:366a-17: bcun mo'i bha ga zhes bya ba ni bde ba can la'o zhes bya ba ni 'joms pa'am /
T02D1452:366a-18: skal ba ston pas bha ga'o //
T02D1452:366a-19: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba bskyed pas ni de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1452:366a-20: bzhugs so zhes bya ba ni gnas pa lta bu'o
T02D1452:366a-21: zhes bya ba ni bde ba 'byung ba'i gnas te
T02D1452:366a-22: khu ba'i gzugs kyis bzhugs zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1452:366a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:366a-24: thun mong ma yin pa'i theg pa 'di la phung
T02D1452:366a-25: po lnga ni rgyal ba rnam pa lnga yin pa
T02D1452:366a-26: la sogs pa'i sgras khams rnams lha mo bzhi yin
T02D1452:366a-27: zhing / skye mched rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02D1452:366a-28: de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ni aom
T02D1452:366a-29: a'a: h'um ngo zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D1452:366a-30: pa de rnams thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs ni
T02D1452:366a-32: gnas pa'i yi ge gsum zhes bya'o //
T02D1452:366a-33: yi ge 'di rnams ni zhes bya ba ni 'bru gsum mo //
T02D1452:366a-34: de rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi khu ba'o //
T02D1452:366a-35: de rnams te phung po la sogs pa'i bde bar
T02D1452:366a-36: gshegs pa de rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems te
T02D1452:366a-38: btsun mo ni mi la sogs pa'i bud med kyi
T02D1452:366a-39: gzugs la sogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni rgyal rigs
T02D1452:366a-40: la sogs pa'i bu mo bzhi'o //
T02D1452:366b-0: @366b sogs pa smos pa ni lha dang lha min
T02D1452:366b-1: la sogs pa yang nus pa can gyis 'gugs pa
T02D1452:366b-2: yin la / sogs pa'i sgra gcig gis sprul pa'i gzhon nu ma yang ngo //
T02D1452:366b-3: de la bud med kyi don mi de'i bha ga'o
T02D1452:366b-4: zhes bya ba ni skal ba ston pa de'i skye
T02D1452:366b-5: gnas so // ae wam 'di ni zhes bya ba ni //
T02D1452:366b-6: rgyud las gsungs pa'i legs par sbyar ba'i skad 'di'o //
T02D1452:366b-7: ae yi cha byad bzang po gang //
T02D1452:366b-8: zhes bya ba ni skabs khyad par can 'dir ni ae'i cha byad zhes bya ba skye gnas dngos /
T02D1452:366b-9: ae'i cha byad du 'dug pa yin la /
T02D1452:366b-11: bzang po ni bde ba yin pas so //
T02D1452:366b-12: dbus su wam gis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1452:366b-13: zhes bya ba ni ae'i dbus gsang ba'i rdo rje
T02D1452:366b-14: wam gi rnam pa lta bu bkod pa yin gyi
T02D1452:366b-15: / yi ge wam ni ma yin no //
T02D1452:366b-16: bde ba thams cad kyi ni gnas //
T02D1452:366b-17: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa dang /
T02D1452:366b-18: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba thams cad kyi
T02D1452:366b-19: phul du phyin pa ni 'di las gzhan na med
T02D1452:366b-21: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / ces bya
T02D1452:366b-22: ba ni sangs rgyas ni bar du chud pa'i byang
T02D1452:366b-24: za ma tog ni yi ge gnyis so //
T02D1452:366b-25: de la bdag gi longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T02D1452:366b-26: sprul pa'i sku thos so zhes bya ba ni 'dzag pa'i don la bya'i /
T02D1452:366b-27: rna ba'i yul du ni ma yin no //
T02D1452:366b-28: 'dzag pa de nyid byang chub kyi sems te /
T02D1452:366b-31: nyams su myong ba la thos pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1452:366b-32: 'di nyid kyi phyir na zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs de bas na'o //
T02D1452:366b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs zhes pa ni /
T02D1452:366b-34: thig le gsum la lcags gsum gyi gzugs so //
T02D1452:366b-35: rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga zhes bya ba ni gong du bshad pa nyid do //
T02D1452:366b-36: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1452:366b-37: de ltar byang chub kyi sems de bzhugs so zhes
T02D1452:366b-38: bya ba ni dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan
T02D1452:366b-39: dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das ni kun rdzob tu
T02D1452:366b-41: dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni rlung 'gog pa'i dus gcig na'o //
T02D1452:367a-0: sam gcig dang zhes bya ba @367a * //
T02D1452:367a-3: 'gog pa'i dus dang zhes bya ba ni phyir mi 'byung ba'o //
T02D1452:367a-4: dpyid kyi dus ji srid pa'i dus so zhes bya
T02D1452:367a-5: ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi myu gu skye
T02D1452:367a-6: ba'am / dga' ba'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1452:367a-7: de yang gsal bar bstan pa ni g-yas pa g-yon
T02D1452:367a-8: pa'i sna bug tu sor ba zhes bya ba ni
T02D1452:367a-9: g-yas g-yon na gnas pa'i rlung ngo //
T02D1452:367a-10: 'gog pa thob pa ni 'gag pa'i don to zhes bya ba ni rlung de nyid do //
T02D1452:367a-11: de ltar rlung 'gags pa des rtog pa mi 'gag gam zhes dogs pa la /
T02D1452:367a-12: chos gang rgyu byung de dag ni //
T02D1452:367a-13: rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa //
T02D1452:367a-14: de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te //
T02D1452:367a-15: dge slong chen pos de skad gsungs //
T02D1452:367a-17: chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel te 'byung ngo zhes kyang gsungs la /
T02D1452:367a-18: de bas rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu rlung 'gags na rtog pa yang 'gag la /
T02D1452:367a-19: gzhan yang g-yas dang g-yon du bkag na me 'bar la /
T02D1452:367a-20: mes bdud rtsi 'dzag cing de 'dzags pas lus ngag yid tshim par byed do //
T02D1452:367a-21: des ni sdug pa'i lha mnyes par 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1452:367a-22: des rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1452:367a-23: srid pa'i rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba
T02D1452:367a-24: ni chos rnams ni gzod ma nas rang bzhin rnam
T02D1452:367a-26: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin shin tu ring du spangs pa'i phyir /
T02D1452:367a-27: rang bzhin gyis 'byung bral bar byas //
T02D1452:367a-28: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:367a-29: gdod ma nas bdag la ldan pa las /
T02D1452:367a-30: bdag la rtog pa med pas ring du spangs shing bral bar bya ste /
T02D1452:367a-31: de bas na sems can rnams kyis bla ma dam
T02D1452:367a-32: pa bsten par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba
T02D1452:367a-33: yin no // gsang ba'i rim pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1452:367a-34: de lta bu'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba'i ye shes gdod ma nas yod pa /
T02D1452:367a-36: yang na 'di lta bu'i lhan cig skyes pa ni
T02D1452:367a-37: gsang bar bya ba yin zhing sba bar bya ba
T02D1452:367a-38: yin no // rang gi sems 'di ni rim pa
T02D1452:367b-0: bzhi pa'o zhes bya ba 'di ni de ltar @367b
T02D1452:367b-1: brjod pa'i rim pa gsum gyi tha ma ni /
T02D1452:367b-3: rang gis rang gi sems rtogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1452:367b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab chos kyi phung po
T02D1452:367b-5: brgyad khri bzhi stong rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni
T02D1452:367b-6: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi brjod
T02D1452:367b-7: bya'i snying po bdag gis rtogs nas zhes bya ba'o
T02D1452:367b-8: // brtul zhugs spyod pa zhes bya ba ni brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa ste /
T02D1452:367b-9: sems can gyi don du 'gyur ba'i bya ba sna tshogs pa'o //
T02D1452:367b-10: slob dpon zhes bya ba ni a'a ts'a rya ste /
T02D1452:367b-12: cho ga'i ngang tshul yod pas de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1452:367b-13: dpal rim pa bzhi pa'i 'grel pa a'a ts'arya nag po nyid kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
